message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. I'm starting with a price of $1000000. This reflects the product's true worth and leaves room for a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a price of $950000.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit away from a price that truly reflects the value I'm bringing to your business. Let's split the difference. I'm willing to come down to $975000. This leaves us both with a good outcome and allows us to move forward.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $960000.
